name: Intro
_source: speak;Lyon Evil;Mm...|Hah hah.|A moment more, and my rebirth will be unstoppable-irreversible.|None remain who can stop me now.;;;noir;;white
speak;Morva;You can clothe yourself in human flesh, but you cannot hide your foul mien.|Eight hundred years wasn't long enough, Demon King.

speak;Lyon Evil;One of the dragonkin, hm...|Ah.|I've seen your face before, lizard.|Yes, during that accursed battle so long ago.|When those wretched men bound me in their fetters.|They fought with an ally from the dragonkin at their side...|I believe his name was Morva.;;;noir;;white

speak;Morva;The protection of the blessed stones is lost.|The dark is rising.|Malevolence given will and form now walks these lands unopposed.|Ancient king of shadows...|they appear to be waiting for you.

speak;Lyon Evil;Very perceptive.|And now I am here.|I must tell them their wait is over.|I must tell them I have been reborn.|Begone, dragon.|I am changed.|I can no longer be stopped by the likes of you.;;;noir;;white
speak;Morva;I live and breathe to protect mankind.|I cannot abandon them to you.|Now, as it once did so long ago, these woods will witness your defeat.

speak;Lyon Evil;So, your dragon blood still runs so hot that you would dare to try to stop me... Dragons.|That reminds me...|Not long back, I fought a rabble of men who traveled with a dragon child.|Tell me, Morva, was that your daughter...;;;noir;;white
speak;Morva;Myrrh left this place long ago to test the limits of your influence.|Could she have...
speak;Lyon Evil;Could she have what...|Pray, continue.;;;noir;;white
speak;Morva;You will answer me.|Your reply will determine...

speak;Lyon Evil;Ha ha ha ha ha...|Such information had no use to you now.|You have dared to challenge me.|You have no time for joy or sorrow.|No, best to focus now on this, the moment of your death.|I would hate for you to miss it.;;;noir;;white
speak;Eirika;I know...|I can feel it too.

speak;Seth;This is Darkling Woods...|It was here the heroes met the Demon King and with the Sacred Stones defeated him.|I've heard the lingering energies of that battle are the source of the monster.|But I never imagined it would be as bad as this...
speak;Myrrh;It's worse than before...|It's grown so much stronger.|Simply standing here is a struggle...|But we don't need to worry.|My father is here.|He'll take care of everything.
speak;Myrrh;Over there.|On the other side of that swamp is the Black Temple of the Demon King.|My father stands guard near it.|This is where my father and I have lived for as long as I can remember.
speak;Ephraim;I see.|So this forest is like a home to you.

speak;Myrrh;Uh-huh...|I get to see Father again.|I'm so happy.|My foster father leads the dragon tribe.|In the last great war...|both of my true parents were killed.|Morva took me in and raised me as though I were his own child.
speak;Eirika;So that's how you came to live here...
speak;Myrrh;My father holds back the monsters that are born in Darkling Woods.|He's so strong, and so very gentle.|One day, I hope to be like him...|......Oh!
speak;Seth;Princess Eirika, Prince Ephraim, we're under attack.|A horde of those foul beasts is headed straight for us.
speak;Eirika;Myrrh, are you well...|If you're ill, we should get you to-
speak;Myrrh;No, no...|It's nothing.|I'll fight with you.|I'll fight, and we'll drive back the dark children.
speak;Lyon Evil;Ha ha ha ha...|Riev...|I'm leaving this to you.;;;noir;;white
speak;Riev;Heh heh heh...|As you wish.|Please proceed with the rites of resurrection, sire.
